Course_Name: [SoSe 2024] SE Exploring the Roots: A History of Botany from Antiquity to Early Modernity

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Zoom Link for Class on 5 July

Messages.Author: Tracy Wietecha
Messages.Content: Hello all! Here is the zoom link for class on this Friday, 5 July: https://gwdg.zoom.us/j/82851486020?pwd=SktUaEtNK04rUlk5QkVyaTdrbWhrdz09

Discussions.Discussion_Name: 19 July Class Meeting at Botanical Gardens

Messages.Author: Tracy Wietecha
Messages.Content: Dear All, On 19 July our class will meet at the Botanical Gardens in Dahlem. Can you please send me a message here to confirm that you will participate? This helps me with the planning, tour, and schedule for our activities there. Thank you!

Messages.Author: Tracy Wietecha
Messages.Content: Dear All, As I announced in class, our session on 5 July will be online only (I will be away at a conference). The topic for that class is changed from the syllabus. We will have a presentation on Chinese medicine and the 17th century. All best, Tracy Wietecha

Messages.Author: Tracy Wietecha
Messages.Content: Dear All, For the Herbarium Apuleii Platonici, please read pp. 238-259, 316-319, and 348-351. All best, Tracy Wietecha
